diff_act: 5.turn off or mute the alarm permanently

regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a permanent mute option for audible alarms, which can be configured on the screen and shall remain in effect until manually changed or overridden by alarm condition changes.

regen.absent_element: option to unmute the audible alarm
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an option to unmute the audible alarm after it has been temporarily muted.
The system shall provide an option to mute the alarm permanently for a given device.

label: There shall be an option to turn off the audible alarm permanently.
absence: action of turning off the audible alarm permanently
